title: Username/Password incorrect on PBE?
body:
I just linked my main account with the pbe, and it said it was successful, but when I try to log in on the pbe client that downloaded this morning it keeps saying that my username/password combination was incorrect? I don't know if this is a known issue but I would like to know if there's a fix of some kind.




{{sticker:sg-lux-2}}

replies.body: Your Username may have been different from the one you use to login to the Live servers. Double check that you're using the right username and password, and you can always hit up our account recovery agents in a ticket if you need help!
Okay, I will do that, thank you! I appreciate the fast response!{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

same thing happened to me

until i realized that i had caps lock on while typing my password
so now my password is all caps
HEHE
